data.name: query
data.value: select t,_id from TeamTasks as t  where (t.TeamTasks.expiration_date={$date} or LOWER(t.TeamTasks.title) like '%{$title}%' ) and t.TeamTasks.assigned[*]={$user}

data.name: query
data.value: select t,_id from TeamTasks as t  where t.TeamTasks.expiration_date={$date} and t.TeamTasks.assigned[*]={$user}

data.name: query
data.value: select u,_id from TeamTasks as u where u.TeamTasks.assigned[*]={$user} and u.TeamTasks.state!='COMPLETADA'

data.name: query
data.value: select t,_id from TeamTasks as t  where  LOWER(t.TeamTasks.title) like '%{$title}%'  and t.TeamTasks.assigned[*]={$user}

data.name: query
data.value: select *  from Meetings as c where TIMESTAMP(c.date) >TIMESTAMP(NOW()) AND c.members[*]={$user} AND c.canceled=false ORDER BY TIMESTAMP(c.date) ASC LIMIT 1

data.name: query
data.value: select u,_id from TeamTasks as u where u.TeamTasks.creator={$user}

data.name: query
data.value: select  c,_id as date from CompanyNews as c where DATE(c.CompanyNews.date) > DATE({$date})  order by DATE(c.CompanyNews.date) desc limit {$limit}

data.name: query
data.value: SELECT c,_id FROM AlexaDevice AS c WHERE c.deviceId={$deviceId}

data.name: query
data.value: select *  from Meetings as c where TIMESTAMP(c.date) >TIMESTAMP(NOW()) AND c.members[*]={$user} AND c.canceled=false ORDER BY TIMESTAMP(c.date) ASC

data.description: Ontology to store team's member tasks
